Interface ReplacementPolicy<K>

  • Type Parameters:
    K - keys for cached items
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClockPolicy

    public interface ReplacementPolicy<K>
    A replacement policy for managing a cache. This class keeps track of items in a cache, and when the client requires an item, it notifies the cache via the require method. The policy then tells the client what item to evict, if any.

    Items are compared using Object.equals(Object).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int capacity()
      Returns the capacity of the cache.
      K require(K item)
      Informs the policy manager that a particular item is required and must be brought into the cache if not already there.
      int size()
      Returns the number of items currently in the cache.

    • Method Detail

      • require

        K require(K item)
        Informs the policy manager that a particular item is required and must be brought into the cache if not already there. Returns the evicted item if eviction is required to make room, or null otherwise.

        Must run in O(capacity()) time.

        Parameters:
        item - the required item (non-null)
        Returns:
        the evicted item or null

      • capacity

        int capacity()
        Returns the capacity of the cache.
        Returns:
        the capacity

      • size

        int size()
        Returns the number of items currently in the cache. Note that it should always be the case that size() â‰¤ capacity().
        Returns:
        number of items currently cached
